basics.name: Tzu-Chieh Wang
basics.label: Front-end Developer
basics.summary: Hi, I am an engineer with passion for front-end development. Focus on SaaS and aspire to be part of a team with a startup atmosphere.

work.name: HTC VIVE
highlights: Iterate the editor for generating avatar models building with WebGL, collaborate closely with 3D artists, and ensure the quality and performance of the output models.
Collaborate with backend team member to manage features and implement business logic related to avatar service.
Deliver 2.5D features while working closely with UIUX designer and clarifying requirements from PM.
Research and deliver experimental POC tasks.
